Package com.example.jobappbackend.controller

Class StudentOfferController

java.lang.Object
com.example.jobappbackend.controller.StudentOfferController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/offers") @CrossOrigin(origins="*") public class StudentOfferController extends Object
Controller for students to view and apply to job offers. Routes are under /student/offers to match SecurityConfig.

      @GetMapping public List<OfferResponse> getAllOffers(Principal principal)

      Returns:

    • applyToOffer

      @PostMapping(value="/{id}/apply", consumes="multipart/form-data") public void applyToOffer(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam("cv") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile cv, @RequestParam("motivation") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile motivation, Principal principal) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Apply to a job offer with CV and motivation letter.
      Parameters:
      id - offer identifier
      cv - CV file (multipart)
      motivation - motivation letter file (multipart)
      principal - the authenticated student
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - if email sending fails
